column1: RestrictionPathing trime must not be used between Bellshill and Mossend West Junction on services routed towardsMossend South Junction owing to signaling constraints, dwell time should be increased at Bellshill

RestrictionWhilst a train is in transit between Uddingston Junction and Viewpark Sidings, a second train cannot be timedtowards Mossend West Junction until 1 minute after the first train has come to a stand in Viewpark Sidings.
